00044 void CHPTilingFileReader::Read(CHPTilingData& data)
00045 {
00046         data.Clear();
00047         GenericFileReader reader;
00048         if (fileName.empty())
00049         {
00050                 fileName = data.GetFilename();
00051         }
00052         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00053         reader.ReadHeader(data.GetGenericData());
00054 }
